name: Cave Escape (itch) (Popitchus)
description:
Try to escape from the mysterious cave you've fallen into in this tight action platformer. Slay the monsters in your way and overcome challenging obstacles. You'll gain special powers such as dash or a wall jump which are simple to learn but with layers of depth to master, where every death is a lesson.

Entertaining gameplay guaranteed!

Credits

Animations:

  • Player by rvros
  • Boss and Skeletons by SanctumPixel
